name: Labs
body:
### Agricultural Data Lab These experiments are primarily rooted in datasets covering Denmark, since this is where I live and I know my way around the officially provided data sets published by the government and/or suppliers. The first experiment is one I did a while back showing exact [location of wind turbines in Denmark](http://martinnormark.github.io/windpowerdk/).

How many #wind turbines do we have in Denmark? There's a map for that: http://t.co/kmzyVMVTTa pic.twitter.com/itnagZnwAl

— HÃ¸st (@hoestag) April 8, 2015
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
